text: the edit preview options only appear on tables that are connected to a page, if the table is not connected to any page it won't appear

Hi team, We are not able to capture few properties like _first page seen, last page seen, IP country, IP timezone, IP state_ etc . we are using API to collect information from our form in the website and fill it in a dummy form created in the tool to create a contact. Any idea why this is happening and how do we solve for this?
ah.. thanks Frederico.. I was wondering why I didn't see that for a couple of custom objects that I created. Maybe that's the reason. I'll have to dig into that. Not essential for me, but I'm curious

there are property attributes. I forget the specific attribute and value, but it may not get those properties by default with a GET request for records... However, you could specifically list all the properties in the GET request and you should get them.

comma separated string of properties you want:
```the_url = f'<https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/{table_name}?properties={properties_str}>'```

Hey everyone. My company has been syncing HubSpot data into our Snowflake database for a while now using their API. Our data pipeline just started failing because the column `property_zip` is gone. I've checked and zip code still is a property on our contact objects. It's the column in the database this is gone.

Has anyone else encountered this and how did you recover the column?
